skillTree.localised_description: The Seafather looks after his own.
This strengthened hook was inspired by the Ogre's ironfists. It can be used to block missiles as well as a weapon.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can block projectiles regardless of its facing.

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: As far as the tide stretches inland, so too does the Sea God's influence.

effects.description: Ward save: 15% when fighting at sea

skillTree.localised_description: "I'd rather give my tenth coin to Ranald than risk losing the remaining nine."

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such methods are blunt and crude in the extreme, but still very, very effective.
If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local region)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Gunnery Mob units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Why would one pretend to be what he is not? There are many reasons, none of them innocent.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: If you're offering enough, most people eventually start to see things your way.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."

effects.description:
Income from all enemy buildings: -5%
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.localised_description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
Strike hard, strike true.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.
"Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -3

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
"If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!

related_attributes.bullet_text:
When charging into an enemy unit:
	  Charge Bonus duration is doubled.
	 Enemy units take a  Leadership penalty as if they have been attacked in the flank.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty
